directive: Critical: Fix production issue in worktree manager
notes: Fixed symlink path confusion in git worktree list. Removed 6 worktrees using symlink paths and normalized to real paths only. After cleanup: 1 main + 5 world worktrees remain.

resolution.root_cause: Git worktree list showed both symlink paths (/Users/shunsuke/Dev/miyabi-private/.worktrees/*) and real paths (/Users/shunsuke/Dev/01-miyabi/_core/miyabi-private/.worktrees/*) due to symlink at /Users/shunsuke/Dev/miyabi-private pointing to 01-miyabi/_core/miyabi-private
actions_taken: Removed 6 worktrees using symlink paths: miyabi-orchestra, phase-2.1-lark-sync, phase-2.2-task-manager, phase-2.3-mcp-integration, pr-773-fix, pr-818
Executed git worktree prune to clean up metadata
Verified all remaining worktrees use real paths only
resolution.result: All worktrees normalized to real paths. System stable.
